duties_responsibilities.duty: Review contracts, coordinate with AHJ, and obtain approved permits for installations.
Schedule installation dates with customers and complete installations according to project agreements.
Submit approved permits, quality assurance form, and job completion report for payment.
Communicate verbally in the English language and demonstrate commitment to exceptional customer service.
Organize and coordinate a complex schedule with varied tasks and follow instructions diligently.
Comfortably use a job management tool such as Monday, Jobber, Commusoft, or similar.
